modShortDescription: Adds a backpack mod (+15 carry weight), Ultimate Goggles, and sprung boots mod(Upgraded version of impact bracing mod - increasing jump height).
modDescription:
Adds a [backpack](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-backpack/) mod (+15 carry weight), Ultimate Goggles (combine looter goggles, nerd glasses, etc), and sprung boots mod(Upgraded version of impact bracing mod – increasing jump height).

## Backpack Mod

* Unlocks 15 extra slots in your inventory (completely removing encumbrance in the vanilla game, without pocket mods or pack mule).
* Can only be placed in chest armor.
* Unlocked via schematic or Needle and Thread completion, but also buyable from traders, and found “in the wild”.

## Ultimate Goggles

* Increases XP gain by 25%
* Increases heat and cold resistance by 10
* Adds +1 to ALL stats
* 25% better buying and selling prices
* Faster crafting (30%)
* Smaller Treasure search radius
* Night Vision
* Unlocked via schematic, or Needle and Thread Completion, but also buyable from traders, and found “in the wild”.

## Sprung Boots Mod

* Increased Jump Strength/Height (30%)
* Reduced Stamina usage while jumping (50%)
* Reduced fall damage (same as vanilla impact bracing mod)
* Unlocked via schematic, or Needle and Thread Completion, but also buyable from traders, and found “in the wild”.

**Important:** Needs to be installed on both the server and client sides, due to custom icon(s)/assets.

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1wdd_X04CwRtEJxDM2e72OQRlm0Mh0pKy/view?usp=sharing)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/20806-freakuks-modlets/).

**Credits:** [FreakUK](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/freakuk/)
